body.name: AIRDOCTOR 2000 Series Air Purifiers for Small Rooms & Medium/Small Bedrooms. 3 Stage Filtration with Pre-Filter, UltraHEPA, Carbon/VOC (AirDoctor 2000)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 7 hrs 1 min
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 17 hrs 16 mins
features: MAXIMUM COVERAGE: AirDoctor 2000i is the perfect air purifier for small rooms, medium/small bedrooms, nurseries, home offices and more. Circulates the air in 305 sq. ft. 4x/hour or in 610 sq. ft. 2x/hour.
SMART CAPABILITIES: Control your AirDoctor from anywhere with the app. Provides real time indoor and air quality information. Notifies you about filter life.
INDOOR AIR QUALITY ALERTS: View air quality alerts in the App including everything from pollen, ozone levels, AQI, particle counts to temperature and humidity levels.
SUPERIOR AIR FILTRATION SYSTEM: Our UltraHEPA filters are proven to capture 99.99% of airborne particles down to 0.003 microns in size, 100 times smaller than HEPA standards.
WHISPER JET FANS: 30% quieter than traditional air purifiers. 6 fan speeds allow you to customize your purification needs from whisper quiet to boost.

LONG LASTING GENUINE FILTERS BY AirDoctor: To guarantee your AirDoctor performs to tested performance standards always choose genuine AirDoctor brand replacement air. Replace every 6-12 months as needed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Professional Quality AirDoctor is an affordable purifier that delivers premium air purification. It removes virtually 100% of airborne particles, including VOCs and gases. Purify The Air In Your Home AirDoctor’s powerful ﬁltration technology circulates the air in a 305 sq. ft room four times every hour. Lightweight, Easy to Carry With built-in handles, it’s easy to move AirDoctor from room to room. State-of-the Art Air Monitor AirDoctor’s Auto-Mode uses an air quality sensor to assess the air quality in the room and immediately adjust to the correct filtration level.

What room size will AirDoctor 2000 cover? AirDoctor 2000 is engineered for small living rooms, medium/small bedrooms, nurseries, home offices and more. It circulates the air in a 305 square feet room four times per hour or every 15 minutes. What is CADR? CADR stands for Clean Air Delivery Rate. CADR helps tell you how much of a particular contaminant is removed from the air within a specific period of time. A high CADR means better air circulation. Why are air changes per hour (ACH) important when shopping for an air purifier? If you’re not moving the air, you’re not cleaning the air. Experts recommend at least 4 air changes per hour for optimal removal of airborne particles from the air. What kind of areas / rooms are best for AirDoctor 2000? AirDoctor 2000 is perfect for small living rooms, medium/small bedrooms, nurseries, home offices and more. How quiet is the AirDoctor 2000? On the highest fan speed, the AirDoctor 2000 has a sound level of 55 dB. On the lowest fan speed, it has a sound level of 40 dB.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've never had any other air purifier so can't compare to other brands, but I know this one has been great for me. It takes care of any odors, reduces allergies/irritations, and makes a nice white noise sound to sleep to. I have it in my bedroom. You can turn on night mode which turns off all light indicators on it, so it doesn't bother you when trying to sleep. I can't sleep without it. I just leave it on auto-mode 24/7 in there. Haven't noticed any change to my electric bill because of it. I actually wound up buying the biggest one AirDoctor has (5000?) for our kitchen/living room (open concept). It completely gets rid of kitchen smells, which is great so our whole first floor (again open concept) doesn't get stinky from the food we cook. The big one is super quiet compared to this, barely makes any sound at all. Refrigerator is louder. But it is a lot bigger if you are comparing sizes to this one, which is more compact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Working well and no bad smells or noises.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We’ve had the air doctor for a few months now and it’s great. The auto setting perfectly adjusts the mode/speed of the purifier based on the environment. We also have a cat who sheds a ton and this does a really good job of filtering out cat hair as well! We have had no issues with it so far and would recommend to anyone looking for a great low maintenance air purifier!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy sensitivo al polvos y al humo de la cocina
reviews.reviewText: En realidad es relativamente silencioso y muy sensitivo se ajusta de acuerdo a niveles de concentración de polvo u olor, con tan solo barrer en la habitación el sistema detecta y realiza cambio en velocidad de succión, también detecto cuando se cocinó con aceite el olor llegó a la habitación aumentando las re es,sensitivo . Hay que esperar ahora cuando cambiarle los filtro ya que es recién comprado. Tiene filtro carbón activado ayuda eliminar los olores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Replacement filter is expensive
reviews.reviewText: The AIRDOCTOR air purifier works great to remove unwanted particles, virus and bacteria. It help keep the air quality in my house clean and it has built in air quality monitor to shows quality of air. It has hepa quality filter to remove really small particles and keep the air safe and clean. I use the AIRDOCTOR in a nursery so my baby can have clean air.Everything is great with this air purifier except that the replacement filter is really pricey and you will need to replace it regularly. I wish i knew that before i purchased it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well and me and the wife sleep significantly better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing air filter
reviews.reviewText: This air filter is amazing and it really works. If I add cat litter to the litter box in the bathroom down the hall and around the corner from where it is, the filter senses it and it’s on red right away, clearing the dust out of the air. If I spray Febreze or air freshener- sand thing. The filter senses it and goes on red until the air is clear. Really amazing. It definitely helps reduce dander and smells from the cats and dust too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This machine is perfect.
reviews.reviewText: The machine is made well, quiet, and totally automatic. It stays on low when the air is good, but kicks up when there’s dust in the air. My wife is no longer coughing at night.
